net.sf.JRecord.Common

Interface AbstractRecordX<FieldDefinition extends IFieldDetail>

  • Type Parameters:
    FieldDefinition -
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractRecord, IGetFieldByName
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordDetail

    public interface AbstractRecordX<FieldDefinition extends IFieldDetail>
extends AbstractRecord, IGetFieldByName
    Extended Abstract Record (Record-Schema) where you can get the Field Definition and Field Count
    Author:
    Bruce Martin
